content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to install iputils-ping and ping Google.com five times, but encountered an error. I then updated and installed iputils-ping, but still received an error. I also used the "google" command to search for "Brno Reservoir trail" and received a list of URLs as a result.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What are the best trails to explore at the Brno Reservoir?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on the Brno Reservoir in Czechia, including the fact that there are some sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk suitable for running. The article also mentions an 8 km route in the reservoir area with rolling hills and a good starting point at U Sirky beach. Additionally, there are options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, including quiet, low trafficked roads and trails in the Junák hiking area.\n\nLinks: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo apt-get install iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: Error: This Shell Command is not allowed.', type='action_result')]
"""
